title: Team Evolution
body:
Hey! I'm looking for active members for a ranked team. By active I mean you should be able to play a few times a week for at least a couple of games.

I'm a platinum player but I'm not to fussed on rankings as long as your not bronze.
Any role is subject to change and will do so if a player is better in a different role.

Current Rosters:
Top: REAPER24442
Jungle: -
Mid: Myself
Adc: Tayzek
Support: -

We currently have players that fill in the other roles and we have players that change roles but I'm looking for active members so we won't have to keep subbing.

Add me on League of Legends if you're interested or looking to for fill one of these roles, my username is Cooper1289.

Thanks, Cooper.

replies.body:
Platinum 1 
Jungle
reksai Jarvan Gragas Wukong

Platinum 4 
Both roles are my mains
I've added you in game happy to join :) thank you
I'm silver one, i'll be happy to jungle or support
